message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that holds immense value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your business. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential value I see in this product for you. Let's discuss this further and explore how this product can benefit you.
